page.title: 20Home Life in Skegness
page.content: I live in a bungalow below sea level on Old Roman Bank. I enjoy using our acre lawn. My home is near both a golf club and the shingle beach. After geeting home from school I get changed and play on the shingle beach until 8 pm. My dad is an art designer and works in Alford. My mum is the secretary of St Matthew's Church. I have many friends. We live a fair way from town. The most famous thing in Skegness is the Clock Tower. The police station is on Park Avenue, next to the Town Hall. My family once owned a guest house on Park Avenue called Savona. I think Park Avenue is the richest area because of all the guest houses and hotels.
